sentences.en: And he sliced the onions as if he had done a Phd in slicing!
sentences.cn: 而且他仅是切了葱就好象已经做好了糕点一样!

sentences.en: Elizabeth Angell is a PhD candidate in anthropology at Columbia University.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白?安吉尔目前是哥伦比亚大学人类学博士研究生.

sentences.en: Firstly, you have to get a PhD, but if you want to practise you then need venture capital, otherwise you don't have the tools.
sentences.cn: 首先，你必须弄到一个哲学博士学位，但是如果你想执业的话还要有创业资本。 要不然你就拿不到仪器。

sentences.en: He has BEc ( Hons ), MEc and PhD degrees from La Trobe.
sentences.cn: 他有拉筹伯大学的经济学学士 、 硕士和博士学位.

sentences.en: He is more highly educated, with a PhD in Chemistry.
sentences.cn: 他受过更高的教育，拥有化学博士学位。

sentences.en: He was awarded his PhD for a thesis on industrial robots.
sentences.cn: 他凭一篇研究工业机器人的论文获得博士学位。

sentences.en: Many people earn a PHD, yet not many are philosophers.
sentences.cn: 一些人获得了“PHD”, 但并不是这些人都是哲学家.

sentences.en: Objective: To investigate the clinic characteristics in elder pulmonary heart disease ( PHD ) accompaniedheart disease ( CHD ) .
sentences.cn: 摘要目的: 探讨老年 肺心病 并 冠心病 的临床特点.

sentences.en: PhD Program in Graduate Institute of Cell and Molecular Biology.
sentences.cn: 细胞及分子生物研究所博士班“,”

sentences.en: Proponents of the PhD argue that it is worthwhile even if it does not lead to permanent academic employment.
sentences.cn: 支持者争辩说，即使找不到终身从事学术研究的工作，攻读博士学位也是值得的。

sentences.en: She's presently working on her PhD.
sentences.cn: 她目前在攻读哲学博士学位.

sentences.en: Someone with a PHD is doctor of philosophy.
sentences.cn: 有人持有“PHD”,就是哲学博士.

sentences.en: The highest degree conferred by NUS is Doctor of Philosophy ( PhD ).
sentences.cn: 新加坡国立大学授予的最高学位是博士学位 ( PhD ).

sentences.en: Wang Yongliang ( 1970 ～ ), male , PhD . candidate, Beijing Broadcasting Institute.
sentences.cn: 王永亮 ( 1970~ ), 男, 北京广播学院新闻学博士生.

sentences.en: Why do you want to go to the US for PhD?
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢听大话,要说的具体,可信.要说明你为什么去.

sentences.en: WZ: Well, we are applying for PhD in your Economics Department.
sentences.cn: 我们在申请贵系的博士学位项目, 我可以问几个问题吗?

trans.tran_cn: 博士学位；哲学博士学位（Doctor of Philosophy）
